attributes.title: DELETE
attributes.review: It’s just HORRIBLE delete this app I think it was reason it made my phone lag cause when I deleted it my phone hasn’t lagged at all sooo this app is horrible!!!😡

attributes.title: Mr.
attributes.review: Best presidential election app ever!  Fun, user friendly, productive!  User invitation code: B9RZ6

attributes.title: Keeping Up With Trump
attributes.review: I love this ap! It allows me to be a part of the Trump campaign and follow him around the country.  I have watched all the Trump rallies on Youtube. 🇺🇸

attributes.title: Joining Trump Train
attributes.review: I think this is a great Ap.Its also a great way to get more wonderful people on board the Trump Train🚂🚃🚃🚃🚃🚃🚃💨 👍❤️

attributes.title: Danger, caution, be warned
attributes.review: This app is full of dangerous content and unsafe to download. It will infect your phone with propaganda and ask you for more money. This is probably a get rich quick pyramid scheme app. You have been warned.

attributes.title: Doesn’t work.
attributes.review: Opened it and it doesn’t work.
